name: oprylands-poolapalooza-is-back-for-another-boozy-summer
title: Opryland’s Poolapalooza Is Back For Another Boozy Summer
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
With Memorial Day behind us, Opryland wastes no time getting the party started. The annual Poolapalooza summer series is essentially a big, free pool party for grown-ups (though all ages are welcomed this year), and it starts this Friday at Opryland’s Cascades pool. It’s free, so we can’t complain. Poolapalooza starts up at 6pm every Friday through July 24, with music beginning at 7pm. This summer’s lineup is:

May 29: Jeffrey Steele
June 5: Armed Forces
June 12: Sons of William
June 19: Space Capone
June 26: KingBilly
July 3: AutoVaughn
July 10: Sam and Ruby
July 17: Ricky Young and Red White Blue
July 24: Brother Trouble
